resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107800</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107800</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087579</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Korea brings homegrown open source to schools</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Korea holt homegrown geöffnete Quelle zu den 
Schulen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Corée apporte la source ouverte du cru aux 
écoles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coreia traz a fonte aberta homegrown às escolas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Corea porta la sorgente aperta homegrown alle 
scuole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η Κορέα φέρνει την homegrown ανοικτή πηγή στα 
σχολεία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corea trae fuente abierta de cosecha propia a las 
escuelas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A C-Net news article on an open content initiative by the South Korean government in order to bring a homegrown open-source platform to 10,000 schools in the country.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">Asia</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein C-Netz Nachrichten Artikel auf einer 
geöffneten zufriedenen Initiative durch die South.Korean Regierung 
zwecks eine homegrown öffnen-Quellenplattform zu 10.000 Schulen im 
Land holen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un article de nouvelles de C-Filet sur une 
initiative contente ouverte par le gouvernement coréen du sud 
afin d'apporter une plateforme du cru d'ouvrir-source à 10.000 
écoles dans le pays.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um artigo da notícia da C-Rede em uma iniciativa 
satisfeita aberta pelo governo korean sul a fim trazer uma plataforma 
homegrown da abr-fonte a 10.000 escolas no país.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un articolo di notizie della C-Rete su 
un'iniziativa soddisfatta aperta dal governo coreano del sud per 
portare una piattaforma homegrown di apr-sorgente a 10.000 scuole nel 
paese.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα άρθρο ειδήσεων γ σχετικά με μια ανοικτή 
ικανοποιημένη πρωτοβουλία από τη νοτιοκορεατική κυβέρνηση 
προκειμένου να παρουσιαστεί μια homegrown πλατφόρμα 
ανοικτός-πηγής σε 10.000 σχολεία στη χώρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un artículo de las noticias de la C-Red sobre una
iniciativa contenta abierta por el gobierno coreano del sur para traer
una plataforma de cosecha propia de la abrir-fuente a 10.000 escuelas 
en el país.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DAN ILETT
FN:DAN ILETT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087579</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107800</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/matters/homegrown-open-source</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
